snippet.title: Sea of Thieves Season 11: Official Content Update Video
snippet.description:
Access all the adventure you crave more quickly than ever before with Season 11's overhaul of Voyages and encounters!

Explore a redesigned Quest system, major expansions to most Trading Companies, shiny new loot items and more when Season 11 puts the Sea of Thieves at your fingertips from January 23rd.

----------------------------------------

Buy the game and forge your own legend: https://www.xbox.com/seaofthieves 
Dive into the Sea of Thieves Forums: https://www.seaofthieves.com/forum 
Follow Sea of Thieves on Twitter: https://aka.ms/SoTTwitter 
Live your best pirate's life with us on TikTok: https://aka.ms/SoTTikTok
Watch live Sea of Thieves piracy on Twitch: https://aka.ms/SoTTwitch
Soak up Sea of Thieves sunsets on Instagram: https://aka.ms/SoTInsta
Like Sea of Thieves on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SeaOfThievesGame
Talk Sea of Thieves on Discord: https://aka.ms/SoTDiscord
For anything else, go to: http://www.seaofthieves.com

Game Pass Ultimate or Core required to play on Xbox One and Xbox Series X|S (sold separately).
